title: LIFE™ Water Ionizers vs Enagic's® Kangen™ Water Ionizer

json.text: comparing life ionizers to Enagic's Kangen?
I head to head comparison will quickly show who is the champion of the ionizer
world
before ionization even happens your water first needs to be filtered
Kangen's Enagic machine only comes with one filter
no matter where you live in what contaminants are in your water
you receive the same filter that only takes out common contaminants
without regard to what's really in your water a quick look on their website
even explains that their units don't filter out heavy metals
life ionizer offers a free water report analysis
and free custom filters based on your water no matter what's in your water
life will identify it and clean it up for you well LIFE Ionizers is surely one the
filtration round
next comes ionization watch out for three factors here
plate surface area the style of the plates
and the power to the plates plates come in two main styles
flat and a match which creates more linear surface edges
increasing the pH and the ORP levels up to fifteen percent
Kangen does not offer mesh plates the LIFE Ionizer M9 has nine max large power plates
along with MESH and delivers more power per square inch than
any other electrode on the market and the results can be seen with the pH
and ORP output Enagic weighs in with a 10 pH
in -600 ORP LIFE steps up with 11.3 pH
and negative 800 ORP without and Enagic's
chemical additive, there just no match for LIFE Ionizers and as the second round ends
we can see the clear winner is again life
next let's look at power because even with the best plates
if you don't have power your alkalinity punch will come up weak
see a water ionizer uses electromagnetism to separate the
carbonates from the minerals in the water
the more power the more efficient the machine is that separating those ions
creating a high pH
and negative or p to deliver the most amount of power
you need two things: 1 - an advanced power delivery system
2 - POWER!  Because the Enagic uses an
old-style transformer they can't create as much a efficient power
so instead they inform customers to use chemical additives to boost the
performance
LIFE Ionizer units use the newest cutting-edge technology
high-powered max yield switch mode power system
which produces a lot more efficient power than the traditional transformer
and with no need for chemical additives.  And as the scorecards go up
we see Enagic with 235 watts of power
in life with up to 450 Watts and beyond
that's more than twice the watts of Kangen and the crowd goes wild
next we put both units in the warranty ring because a water ionizers is an
investment
warranty matters Enagic offers a five year warranty on parts and labor with
lots of sneaky ways that the warranty can be voided
life offers a guaranteed lifetime warranty
on their top-of-the-line units OUCH
now that one hurt we're not sure if Kangan can last another round
but here it comes price you would think that with all the life ionizer benefits
it would cost way more but because you're purchasing straight from the
manufacture
you can purchase a life unit for almost half the amount of a Kangen
I know it's hard to believe but Kangen use as a multi-level marketing technique
to sell their water ionizer units
so when you purchase a water ionizer you end up paying seven people down the line
and with a clear victory life ionizers has been crowned the water ionizer
champion
with a 60 day money back guarantee financing
and a unit that's just right for you the choice is clear
don't pay more for less call us at  life ionizers today
want something with a bigger punch try our LIFE Ionizer rm11 with 11 max plates
